title: Managed Kubernetes
description: Hassle-free Kubernetes clusters so you can focus on your business.

items.title: Google Kubernetes Engine
items.description: Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) is a managed, production-ready environment for running containerized applications.

items.title: Elastic Kubernetes Service
items.description: Amazon EKS is a managed Kubernetes service to run Kubernetes in the AWS cloud and on-premises data centers.

items.title: Azure Kubernetes Service
items.description: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) offers the quickest way to start developing and deploying cloud-native apps in Azure, datacenters, or at the edge with built-in code-to-cloud pipelines and guardrails.

items.title: Digital Ocean Kubernetes
items.description: Business-ready Kubernetes. Scale at a moment's notice with a 99.95% High Availability SLA, free control plane, and low-price bandwidth for CNCF Certified Kubernetes.

items.title: Linode Kubernetes Engine
items.description: LKE is a fully-managed K8s container orchestration engine for deploying and managing containerized applications and workloads.

items.title: Scaleway Kubernetes Kapsule
items.description: Kapsule is a Scaleway's public cloud service, allowing to provision, install, and manage Kubernetes clusters, on demand.
